caption.p: Annual sum of the fresh snow thicknesses daily measured at 5:40 a.m. from 1964 to 2011 (at Château‐d'Oex – CHD, and Grimsel Hospiz – GRH weather stations) and from 1987 to 2011 at the Evolène ( EVO) weather station (MeteoSwiss network, Begert et al. 2005). The overall decrease in the snow amount among the three stations is significant ( ANCOVA test, P‐value < 0.001).
